entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Minimal does not set response type nullability #58681
  • MVC App with nullable return type should include 204 No Content response #58680
  • Perf regression: json, json_spring #58679
  • AOT warnings on minimal API Map* methods outside of Program.cs #58678
  • QuickGrid error: A second operation was started on this context instance before a previous operation completed #58669
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #58665

Closed

  • Add built-in support for generating OpenAPI document from APIs #54598
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: json_ntex #58666
  • Blazor Kubernetes/Minikube behind ingress/nginx sigin-oidc not working #58668
  • .Net 9 Blazor Server doesn't find components in interactive mode #58625
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58654
  • Perf improvement: https #58635

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24527.7 #58671
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Always use --apply-cop-headers in ThreadingAppTest #58642
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/2.3] Update EF Submodule to 2.3 #58613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Fully qualify type names for services when resolving in RequestDelegateGenerator #58640
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Use MacOS-13 in CI #58549
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
